00014 // 
00015 // *** get the current time stamp
00016 //
00017 double OutputService::getTimeStamp() const
00018 {
00019   struct timeval now;
00020   struct timezone dummyTZ;
00021   gettimeofday(&now, &dummyTZ);
00022   return (double) now.tv_sec + (double) now.tv_usec / 1000000.0;
00023 }
